ygData.subject: Download User Guide
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, Is it possible to download the user guide https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Heritrix+3.0+and+3.1+User+Guide as a single document? Failing

Subject: Download User Guide
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=278860915
From: Colin Rosenthal <csr@...>

Hi,

Is it possible to download the user guide
https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Heritrix+3.0+and+3.1+User+Guide
as a single document?

Failing that, would it be possible to add "next page" arrows to the sub 
pages so that it is possible to read the guide
continuously on-line?

(For example as in the NetarchiveSuite documentation 
https://sbforge.org/display/NASDOC44/User+Manual , also on
Confluence.)

best regards,
Colin Rosenthal
